OOC::

I"M BAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAACK!
Sorry I was gone so long. Hospitals don't let you have comps in some 
of the rooms. I'm back and ready to RPG the heck out of you all. Now 
let's play.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> I'm waitin on Shadowess.  Malice and Wolfblade are playin one hell 
of a drinking game that I am about to wrap up as soon as she gets 
back.  Then I'll head for the cannon, link up, and boost it.  
Meanwhile, shadowess will probably launch our back up to keep Unicron 
from moving.  Not even he can defy a black hole right by a sub space 
instability.  Then we can intro my second char Organics and Malice's 
history.  But more on that later.  I'll have to wait for Shadowss to 
get back then I'll jump on getting to the gun. 
>
